title: Episode 231: The Misinformation on Inflation
itunes:title: Episode 231: The Misinformation on Inflation
description:
Consumer prices have been rising more than usual since February. James and Ant discuss the nature of inflation, what causes it, and when it is and isn’t a bad thing.
